item.title: Dog waste bins not emptied for 3-4 weeks, July & August, 3rd September
item.description:
Crickley hill country park, none of the dog waste bins have been emptied for 3-4 weeks in July and August

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A436, Coberley, Cotswold

item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 3rd September
item.description:
Gully at the end of aco channel is dropping slightly and is causing vehicles to damage the private drive, it also take a long time to drain away so may be blocked as well. This is imperative for emergency vehicles.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping on Malthouse Lane, 3rd September
item.description:
Flytipping on the pavement on Malthouse Lane, outside 47A St Paul's Road. Sofa, cardboard packaging and a refrigeration unit.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Malthouse Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Bocked drains, 3rd September
item.description:
The drain on the corner of Suffolk Rd / Bath Rd junction is blocked and after minimal rain the surface water is a hazard for cyclists turning left. The drain surround was recently leveled, but the drain is still blocked. In fact the next drain along is completely overgrown with vegetation too as our many along both sides of Suffolk Rd all the way to the Landown roundabout.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Suffolk Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light is out, 3rd September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7-12, Selkirk Close, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a line of potholes across the road close to 1 Oak Avenue, 2nd September
item.description:
There is a line of potholes across the road close to 1 Oak Avenue. The photo shows that the road around them is breaking up so they will get worse especially as Oak Avenue is used as a cut through and gets a lot of traffic. The road is dipping slightly at the same point - possibly indicating a problem with an underground pipe.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Oak Avenue, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
